This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Weighs - EP 1
programme.desc: If current trends continue, a quarter of the world's population will be obese by 2035; it is a global crisis. The six tourists come face-to-face with the horrors of the obesity crisis in different parts of the world and confront the alarming truth of what may await them if they don't tackle their own challenges. At the end of each week, participants are weighed together on a giant scale to see if their hard work trying to lose weight - and the shocking things they have seen - has paid off.

programme.title: Gado Gado 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Siri komedi popular 90an, Gado Gado kini kembali dengan nafas baru dengan mengembalikan konsep komedi sketsa dan satira yang mempunyai pendekatan seperti slot television asli, iklan, telemovie, drama siri dan juga dokumentari.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong? S4 - EP 3
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline - EP 3
programme.desc: Lawak Ke Der Tak Coverline merupakan sebuah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan pelawak-pelawak terkenal Malaysia dan dihoskan oleh Hans Isaac.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 10
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita.

programme.title: Cik Bunga Encik Sombong - EP 5
programme.desc: Tidak semena-mena Intan Asnidar yang menghantar bunga menjadi tunangan Harris Isqandar apabila gadis yang sepatutnya menjadi tunangannya melarikan diri. Apakah kesudahannya?

programme.title: Sorry, Sengaja! - EP 2
programme.desc: Rancangan "prank" yang berlaku di pejabat Astro, melibatkan pekerja-pekerja yang selalunya tidak menjangka akan sesuatu berlaku. Rancangan ini dikepalai oleh beberapa "prankster" dari Thinker Studios.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar - EP 14
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang seorang ibu tunggal, Mak Jah dan kisah kehidupannya bersama lapan orang anaknya yang sudah dewasa.

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 1
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin & Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: Pecah Perut - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebuah program sketsa komedi yang menampilkan barisan pelawak dan pelakon popular seperti Kamal Adli, Sherry Al-Hadad, Shahrul Shiro, Mamak Puteh dan ramai lagi.

programme.title: Kak Lina Ter-Over Take Over - EP 5
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Kak Lina Pom Pom yang kecoh dan lucu bersama para tetamu jemputan melakukan cabaran istimewa yang pasti mencuit hati anda sekeluarga.

programme.title: Dr. Pontianak S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang unik di mana entiti menjadi tumpuan utama! Mengkaji mitos dan memecahkan stigma sosial tentang alam ghaib sambil memberi anda gambaran tentang dunia mereka.

programme.title: Kebun Urban - EP 6
programme.desc: Razif akan menemuramah serta mencungkil rahsia petani-petani kecilan di Malaysia yang menanam sayuran dihalaman rumah mereka. Razif dan Sherson Lian akan memasak resipi ringkas menggunakan tanaman mereka.

programme.title: Makers Malaysia - EP 6
programme.desc: Makers Malaysia mengetengahkan individu-individu dalam pelbagai bidang seni kreatif seperti fesyen, pereka kasut, dan sebagainya. Individu tersebut akan berkongsi inspirasi dan proses yang terlibat.

programme.title: Hard To Heart - EP 4
programme.desc: Program temubual bersama artis tersohor, mengenai jatuh bangun mereka dalam sepanjang terbabit dengan kerjaya seni tempatan.

programme.title: Lagi Riuh... Macam Macam Aznil - EP 13
programme.desc: Dato' Aznil Haji Nawawi kembali dalam musim terbaru Lagi Riuh Macam Macam Aznil, lebih riuh, lebih meriah dan lebih menghiburkan.

programme.title: Casa Impiana - EP 2
programme.desc: Program hiasan yang akan memaparkan keunikan dan keindahan rumah yang dibuat sendiri oleh pemiliknya. Tuan rumah berkongsi rahsia cara untuk mencantikkan rumah dari segi idea, petua dan citarasa peribadi.

programme.title: Celup - EP 4
programme.desc: Hidup Ria yang mewah berubah sekelip mata. Demi mendapatkan harta, Ria bersubahat dengan seorang lelaki Cina iaitu Sean. Berjayakah Sean menolong Ria?

programme.title: RIAlisasi Job Selebriti - EP 3

programme.title: Antara Bintang, Mimpi & Cinta
programme.desc: Larissa, seorang pelakon terkenal tetapi bersifat diva digandingkan dengan seorang pelakon Indonesia dalam filem terbarunya, tanpa mengetahui bahawa pelakon tersebut hanya seorang penjual bakso.

programme.title: Hasrat Tersirat - EP 11

programme.title: Ibu Pinjaman
programme.desc: Konflik Rizal dan Makcik Rokiah, keduanya memendam rasa gelora kerinduan akan sebuah kasih sayang. Rizal yang dahagakan kasih sayang seorang ibu

programme.title: Karok La Kau! - EP 7

programme.title: Savannah, La Ballade
programme.desc: Savannah, aged six, abandoned by her parents, runs away. She meets Colin and Mailland, two very likeable convicts hiding out in an old farmhouse. They decide to look after her. But the disappearance of the little girl soon alerts the authorities, who set out to track down the fugitives.

programme.title: Dans Le Noir
programme.desc: After surviving the journey across the Mediterranean, a young Guinean migrant finds refuge in Paris with a Senegalese dandy who makes a living by renting out his ID documents.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 6
programme.desc: We discover the Luberon's most gorgeous hill-top villages. Brantes, at the foot of Mont Ventoux, where the locals want to keep their village alive. Rosans, in the Baronnies Provencales, where Jean-Francois Rousseau helps young growers set up. And Ferrassieres, on the Albion plateau, to visit the Chateau de la Gabelle.

programme.title: Quel Avenir Pour Nos Abeilles ?
programme.desc: Apiculture is on the rise in Swiss towns, to the point where the many honeybees are vying with rare wild species and butterflies for food: a problematic situation for the biodiversity. Should we regulate production and make it more respectful of nature?

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver - EP 2
programme.desc: At the Tierbergli mountain hut, the season can finally begin. But things are very quiet at the Zapport; military exercises mean that clients are unable to take the shortest route to reach the refuge in Grialetsch. Tanja and Werner decide to take on extra staff.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 6
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone - EP 4
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 19
programme.desc: Ronon Le Corre has been a shellfish picker for the last twenty years, gathering one particular species in the Audierne and Douarnenez Bays: tellines. But in recent years it has become increasingly rare. Plankton, its main source of food, is directly affected by the polluted water released into the sea.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1676
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 22
programme.desc: Coralie and eleonore have invested in a former hotel dating back to the 20th century, near Reims, to turn it into a shared home in the country.

programme.title: Quel Avenir Pour Nos Abeilles ?
programme.desc: Apiculture is on the rise in Swiss towns, to the point where the many honeybees are vying with rare wild species and butterflies for food: a problematic situation for the biodiversity. Should we regulate production and make it more respectful of nature?

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 91
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 22
programme.desc: Coralie and eleonore have invested in a former hotel dating back to the 20th century, near Reims, to turn it into a shared home in the country.

But in recent years it has become increasingly rare. Plankton, its main source of food, is directly affected by the polluted water released into the sea.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 47
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 43
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 4
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 21
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 7
programme.desc: A woman has born ninety children: all boys. She decides to disguise one as a girl in order to offer him to the king of the village as a wife. Jealous, one of the king's wives denounces the deception.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 8
programme.desc: Connonni is a little bird and maid of all work for Bamousso the chicken, who treats her very badly. One day, the king asks everyone to come and work for him. Bamousso sends Connonni in her place, and the little bird finds herself being rewarded for her services.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 14
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1677
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Combat D'alice
programme.desc: Alice, aged 16, is deeply affected by the death of her mother. While staying with her grandparents, she gets attached to a calf before realising that it is destined for the slaughterhouse. Unable to bear the thought, she commits herself body and soul to the militant cause against animal suffering.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Avant L'effondrement
programme.desc: Tristan, campaign director for a parliamentary election candidate, panics when he discovers a positive pregnancy test in his post. Potentially suffering from a fatal genetic disease, he investigates to discover if this is a political trick or a genuine test. Even if it means abandoning his professional and love life.

programme.title: Treizor
programme.desc: A father and his son have an appointment with a psychiatrist to try to understand the young man's OCD behaviour and rituals that all revolve around the number 13.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: A man swims in the sea. As he advances, memories come flooding back. From early childhood to his adult life, all his memories are connected to water. Some are happy, others glorious or even traumatic...

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 5
programme.desc: Laurence is preoccupied by how her baby's arrival will affect her education. Martin tries to mend his fences with Stephanie. The latter has to take a difficult decision concerning her professional future.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 6
programme.desc: Stephanie and her daughters' lives may already be complicated, but Donald's return makes them even more so! Stephanie tries to keep focused during her first day of work at the bank, but problems accumulate. Laurence and Antoine are now an item again.

programme.title: Les Perles - EP 7
programme.desc: Antoine's announcement creates tensions. Seeing that her reaction disappoints Laurence, Juliette takes things in hand and tries to turn the situation around. Donald says too much and has to move out.

programme.title: Maghreb-Orient Express - EP 4

programme.desc: Viola discovers a house completely built with recycled materials before improvising a visit to the top floor of the highest tower block in Switzerland.

programme.title: Donner L'gout - EP 10
programme.desc: Helene meets Mexican-born Maria Razo, who came to Quebec for love. Maria quickly realizes she misses the flavors of home and decides to open a restaurant to reconnect with her childhood from Sainte-Marie-de-Beauce.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 22
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Donner L'gout - EP 10
programme.desc: Helene meets Mexican-born Maria Razo, who came to Quebec for love. Maria quickly realizes she misses the flavors of home and decides to open a restaurant to reconnect with her childhood from Sainte-Marie-de-Beauce.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 7
programme.desc: Viola discovers a house completely built with recycled materials before improvising a visit to the top floor of the highest tower block in Switzerland.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 2
programme.desc: Intimate, wild and preserved, the Queyras still jealously guards its mountain authenticity. In Saint-Veran, focus on those who, united by a shared passion for their territory, do everything to maintain and protect it.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 48
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne - EP 44
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphael, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 5
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 22
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 9
programme.desc: A little mouse returns from a walk and tells her mother that she has made a new friend. But the little mouse is cross: a cock had chased her friend away. And yet, maybe the cock had actually saved her life... her new friend was none other than a cat.

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 10
programme.desc: Little Ahiwa lost her mother when she was very young. Her father re-married, but the step-mother was very unkind to little Ahiwa. Despite her suffering, Ahiwa managed to carry on smiling. Her step-mother is furious, and determined to make Ahiwa's life as difficult as possible.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 15
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1678
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 5
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Monsieur La Souris
programme.desc: Mr. La Souris, a kind vagabond with good manners, opens the doors in front of a nightclub. One evening, a car arrives containing a body. La Souris picks up the dead man's wallet. When he becomes a police suspect in the murder enquiry, he decides to carry out his own investigation.

programme.title: Maestro
programme.desc: By moonlight, in the depths of a forest, a choir of wild animals conducted by a squirrel perform a piece from a Bellini opera.

programme.title: Donovan S'evade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 7
programme.desc: Both for her health and that of her baby, Irene has to do as little as possible. She continues to work on her files, whilst Paule replaces her in court. Meanwhile, Nadia draws Paule's attention to one particular case: a teenager suspected of having served as bait for a murder.

programme.title: Lebowitz Contre Lebowitz - EP 8
programme.desc: The law firm is in financial difficulties. Irene counts on Paule's cooperation. Even though she could go into labour at any moment, Irene has no choice but to assist her on the case involving her aunt Suzanne, suspected of having poisoned a wealthy man to misappropriate his goods.

programme.desc: Many cities around the world dedicate insane amounts of space to parking. programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: From Northern Nigeria to Southern Kenya, pastoralists have existed for centuries. In Northern Nigeria, farmers and herders share a long history of cooperation - yet across the region, they increasingly find themselves in competition for land and water. In this episode, we explore whether pastoralism can endure in a rapidly changing modern world.

programme.desc: Adithya Varma, the wayward son of a businessman, tries to turn over a new leaf after he falls for Meera Shetty. However, caste issues derail their love life and appear to darken Adithya's future.

programme.title: Movie - Neelakuyil
programme.desc: Muthusamy, a poor vagabond, falls in love with Shalini, a blind flower seller, and works hard to afford a surgery to restore her eyesight. However, circumstances change drastically for both of them.

programme.title: Movie - Aarya Surya
programme.desc: Arya and Surya, two struggling actors, put a smuggler behind bars. But the smuggler's boss chases them to seek revenge.

programme.title: Movie - Mannava
programme.desc: Nandini's father agrees to her marriage with Ishwar. When an astrologer predicts that Ishwar is going to kill someone in 45 days, her father postpones the marriage.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 12
programme.desc: Having originally joined Arsenal as a teenager in 2015, Donyell Malen's currently becoming a key figure in Unai Emery's Aston Villa side a decade later. Malen talks us through his journey that started in the Ajax academy, culminating in an Eredivisie title with PSV in 2018, following his brief stay in North London. He reflects on his time in the Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund and making the 2024 Champions League final before his transfer to Aston Villa last January.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 22
programme.desc: We tell the story of a commanding centre-back whose leadership and consistency made him a standout figure in both the Premier League and international football. From his early career in Portugal to his influential spell at Southampton, PL Stories explores how Fonte became a rock in the heart of defence during the club's rise in the top-flight.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'Der Hammer' for his thunderous left foot, Thomas Hitzlsperger sits down to reveal his ultimate 1-to-11. Reflecting on his Premier League journey with Aston Villa, West Ham, and Everton, he shares stories of the teammates who stood out most along the way. It's a team that blends flair, toughness, and match-winning ability.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: EXTRA TIME - MON 03 NOV (Live)
programme.desc: A look at a Premier League season through the eyes of a player who excelled that particular year. The highs and lows and everything in between, that made it a memorable and at times defining nine months for both the player and his club.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 12
programme.desc: Having originally joined Arsenal as a teenager in 2015, Donyell Malen's currently becoming a key figure in Unai Emery's Aston Villa side a decade later. Malen talks us through his journey that started in the Ajax academy, culminating in an Eredivisie title with PSV in 2018, following his brief stay in North London. He reflects on his time in the Bundesliga with Borussia Dortmund and making the 2024 Champions League final before his transfer to Aston Villa last January.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 22
programme.desc: We tell the story of a commanding centre-back whose leadership and consistency made him a standout figure in both the Premier League and international football. From his early career in Portugal to his influential spell at Southampton, PL Stories explores how Fonte became a rock in the heart of defence during the club's rise in the top-flight.

programme.desc: Leeds are winless in their last nine away league games against Brighton (D3 L6), since a 3-0 victory in November 2009 in League One under Simon Grayson.

programme.title: FS MMA Tara LaRosa vs. Cody Welchlin
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Two females in the flyweight division Tara LaRosa meets Cody Welchlin in a fight that does not go the distance. A spectacular arm triangle cliches the victory for one woman in Trenton, NJ, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Paul Williams vs. Erislandy Lara
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a welterweight bout between former champion Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-2, 27 KOs) and up and comer Erislandy Lara, aka 'The American Dream", 15-0, 10 KOs). The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 9, 2011.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Adonis Stevenson vs. Jesus Gonzales
programme.desc: This episode features a super middleweight brawl between top contenders Adonis Stevenson and Jesus Gonzales that includes a Knockout of the Year candidate, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Erik Morales vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is an interim WBA light welterweight title fight between Erik Morales and Marcos Maidana that gave Maidana a chance to leap back into the boxing title scene, while Morales provided fans with a vintage performance. Also on the card, action from WBO welterweight champ Carlos Quintanta.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Ryuden, Daishomaru, Hidenoumi and Kaisei from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Take a look back at the moments from the Regional Qualifiers and Finals that defined the best season of "American Ninja Warrior" ever. Walk-ons that came out of nowhere, unparalleled acrobatics and more!

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: This episode features Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his WBC Light Middleweight title against contender Alfonso Gomez, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Aoiyama, Ishiura, Ikioi and Chiyonokuni from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Alfonso Gomez
programme.desc: This episode features Saul (Canelo) Alvarez defending his WBC Light Middleweight title against contender Alfonso Gomez, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Aoiyama, Ishiura, Ikioi and Chiyonokuni from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Bantamweight champion Dominick Cruz helps out with children's charities and feeding the hungry. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features former Middleweight Champion Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-2, 17 KOs) in a back and forth battle with Jeff "Left Hook' Lacy (24-1, 17 KOs) in a WBC Super Middleweight Title Eliminator on November 15, 2008 from the Vanderbilt University Memorial Gymnasium in Nashville, Tennessee, USA.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Kakuryu, Shodai, Tochinoshin and Ichinojo from the Haru basho, 2018.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 103
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are flamenco dancing! Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po are surprisingly good.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: The friends are on safari and collect stars for every animal they spot. Mae-Mae wants to see them all but when things take a muddy turn, can they get their safari adventure back on track?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Dog and Pug visit a spooky castle, where they meet a princess who has no friends.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: Messy and friends go to the funfair. But when the shrinkasizer comes out, they end up in a giant mess with mini Mini!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zam's new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: JoJo, Gran Gran and all the family plan an Easter feast. When there isn't enough space in the kitchen to prepare the food, it's time for a Gran Gran plan outside in the garden.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: At the wetland centre, JoJo and her friends Alfie, Raya, Jaxon and Isaiah find frog spawn. Gran Gran and Cynthia teach them about the life cycle of frog spawn to tadpole and frog.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: Umbrella is nervous about meeting up with his pen pal at the Parasol Show, so Sarah & Duck accompany him.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: John's yellow bouncy ball is too bouncy, but Sarah thinks she knows where the solution can be found...

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 3
programme.desc: Toby's passengers can't stop making fun of him, that is until he discovers two villains trying to steal King Godred's crown.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 12
programme.desc: Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 27
programme.desc: Dad has rudely plonked himself on one end of the seesaw. So Bluey and Bingo round up the entire playground to help move him off, but they still need to find one more friend.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 28
programme.desc: It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Supertato (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: Evil Pea steals Supertato's brand new Tato Car but doesn't realise that the Grape Kids are in the back seat. Supertato has to get the Grape Kids back to safety and save his car.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 40
programme.desc: King Tiger has met his perfect partner and he is getting married. It's going to be a royal wedding!! The squirrels are to be special Guests of Honour, but who is King Tiger marrying!?

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: King Tiger and the Jelly wonder what Duggee has planned for today. Tag wants a snack, Enid has a musical cheese chase, and Norrie has a haircut.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Glitch visits Rome to race his Grimbots in the Colosseum. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: The grimbots attach a bit of the Taj Mahal to GrimHQ. It remains to be seen whether the Go Jetters can fix the glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: When Grandmaster Glitch makes popcorn in Mount Etna, Italy, he blocks the volcano and endangers farms on its slopes.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Harry serves Kugelis, which is a Lithuanian dish.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Andy, Jen & Scout head to Patagonia, in South America on a baby animal mission in search of mother puma and her four cubs.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 11
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed are enjoying singing the Swashbuckle song but Captain Captain isn't very happy and suggests they write something themselves, with disastrous results.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Lily finds a flight-themed book that has instructions on how to make simple aircrafts.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Evil Pea plunges Broccoli and Carrot into the doughnut toppings simultaneously and Supertato almost quits being a Superhero when he can't save his two friends at the same time.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 86
programme.desc: The Teletubbies go 'this way, that way' on a Tubby Car journey to the Hidey Hup. The Tubby Spinny goes 'this way, that way' too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'dragon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of dragons!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Zip thinks Phoebe could be a superhero, so they craft some awesome superhero cuffs.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Okidoodle is jealous of the new RoboCar, which can go super fast! Will Okidoodle be able to catch up with the RoboCar and earn back Messy's admiration?

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 38
programme.desc: In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 47

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 5
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1

While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 44
programme.desc: The Head Builder isn't happy. Someone's been playing with the builders' stuff and now their pulley doesn't work. Noddy decides he needs to find out who did it before anything else goes wrong. Who broke the Builders' pulley?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 - EP 45
programme.desc: When Noddy comes to give Smartysaurus an invitation to Queen Sparklewings's picnic, there's a big pile of cabbages blocking her front door. Noddy investigates: who left the big pile of cabbages there and why? And will he be able to solve the case in time for the Royal Picnic?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes… but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 32
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 9

Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22

But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. The series’ signature "A Closer Look" segment has garnered millions of views and is widely lauded for its tightly written and thoughtful approach to analyzing and satirizing news of the day.

programme.title: Late Night with Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Emmy Award-nominated "Late Night with Seth Meyers," hosted by award-winning writer and performer Seth Meyers, is home to incisive humor, topical jokes and A-list celebrity guests. programme.title: CNBC On Assignment
programme.desc: CNBC goes on assignment at the biggest events around the world, bringing you interviews and insight from the most influential leaders in business, politics, activism and the arts.

programme.title: The CNBC Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich.

programme.title: CNBC Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

"Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. programme.title: Closing Bell - EP 1
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Closing Bell: Overtime - EP 1

The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. programme.title: NHK Amateur Singing Contest Special Edition "Minato Ward, Tokyo" (R)
programme.desc: A very popular live program on a Sunday afternoon held at different towns and cities around Japan. Guest singers will also join in for support.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: A Trip Packed with Indulgence "Lisbon"
programme.desc: Even grown-ups want to travel on their own terms. This show is here to indulge your every travel whim! We take you on a rich, three-day journey to a dream destination abroad. The experience is packed with gourmet delight, iconic sights, and hidden local gems only the insiders know. Ready to treat yourself to a fun and slightly luxurious experience that only adults can truly savor?

programme.title: Songs for Everyone (R)
programme.desc: A song program where children can sing along by reading the lyrics on the screen.

programme.title: Ninja Art of Heart, Popomaru!
programme.desc: A fun ninja drama where parents and children can explore emotional growth together! The story follows Shinobi, an elementary school ninja, as she teams up with Popomaru -- the playful spirit of emotions -- to learn a creative way of understanding feelings and building positive relationships with those around her. Join her on an exciting journey to discover how to handle emotions with skill and joy!

programme.title: SCIENCE ZERO
programme.desc: A scientific information program which explains the latest research, disasters and accidents from scientific aspects with a virtual set in the studio.

programme.title: Welcome to Special Zoo Tour
programme.desc: A video collection of heartwarming and rarely seen moments captured by zoo staff.

programme.title: Tokyo Local Information NETADORI! (R)
programme.desc: A program probing into the truth behind the news related to the Tokyo Metropolitan area.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 42 (R)
programme.desc: Tsutaju manages to recover his business with Utamaro’s upper-body portrait series "Fujin Sogaku Juttai." As the new year begins, he rebuilds his shop after losing half his fortune. Furthermore, Utamaro’s latest nishikie, portraying Edo’s poster girls, becomes a huge hit, breathing new life into the town and drawing crowds to the shops. Amidst this renewed bustle, Tei tells Tsutaju she’s pregnant.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)
programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: Hello! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: Showcasing various programs and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN which provides the latest information on Japan and Asia to the global audience.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan
programme.desc: Fresh news and information to start off the morning. Specialized reporters and anchors will wake up the viewers with this live news program.

programme.title: Holiday Interview "Minatogawa Takanobu"
programme.desc: Interviewing public figures from various fields about their starting point and how it remains etched into their memory.

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date weather information.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 26
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: The Legendary Concert "Sawada Kenji Remastered Version"
programme.desc: In October 1989, a live performance was held at Tokyo Bay NK Hall, featuring a newly formed backing band, JAZZ MASTER (Yoshida Ken on bass, Shuichi "PONTA" Murakami on drums, Shibayama Kazuhiko on guitar, and Asamoto Hirofumi on keyboards). The setlist is packed with variety-including hit songs, as well as works by an impressive lineup of distinguished songwriters-offering a non-stop musical experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Face Recognition" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Drama 10 "Shiba Inu's Rule" Eps. 4 (R)
programme.desc: An egoistic magazine editor in his forties finds himself completely alone at work-abandoned by colleagues, with only his Shiba Inu by his side. Inspired by the dog, he proposes a Shiba-themed magazine. Misfits are forced to collaborate, sparking friction and chaos. But through the dog’s gentle gaze, ideas emerge, and broken hearts begin to heal.

programme.title: Drama Serial Encore "Toto Nee-Chan: Fatherly Sister" Eps. 126
programme.desc: The 94th Drama Serial is about a girl Tsuneko who struggles to protect her mother and two sisters instead of her deceased father with following his lesson "How precious a normal life is." The lifestyle magazine published by Tsuneko becomes a must-read book for every woman living through the high economic growth period.

programme.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Disaster Response Robots: If disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people if fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents prevent smooth recovery - that's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human, until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 18
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human, until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead.

programme.title: The Merchant : Gaekju 2015 - EP 15
programme.desc: Cheon Bongsam, who begins his life as a market tout, becomes the most powerful merchant of Joseon after going through experiences as a head of a private merchant army and a chief master merchant.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.

programme.title: The Korean Language Connects the World
programme.desc: KBS World continues to bring entertaining and informative programmes to viewers!

programme.title: 2025 APEC MUSIC FESTA
programme.desc: The 2025 APEC Music Festival is a world-class music event held ahead of the 2025 APEC Summit. Featuring globally renowned artists, it serves as a platform to showcase the cultural prestige of Gyeongju, the host city, to the world.

programme.title: Hello Monster - EP 10
programme.desc: A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime, concealing their true intentions. However, they fall in love with each other and start to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies - EP 12
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family - one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar - EP 23
programme.desc: In this bold yet heartbreaking story, a mother and daughter-in-law meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human? - EP 19
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human, until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead.

programme.title: Moving Voices in Spain - EP 5
programme.desc: "Moving Voices" follows Korean artists travelling to different places around the world. While they experience different countries' music and cultures, they embark on a journey to find their true self as a singer. What kind of music and stories will these singers share?

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 4
programme.desc: Ho-yee buys Ko Tsun a meal. Chi-lam pretends to get into trouble as she coaxes Ko Tsun into saving her. Chi-tung takes on a case that involves some cleaner suing Yee-ting. Yee-ting asks Ko Tsun for help. Ho-yee, Chi-tung and Ko Tsun question the cleaner and find out Lai-kei aids and abets them. Ko Tsun asks Sau-yi to tell Yee-ting to resolve this matter by apologizing.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 5
programme.desc: Sau-yi tells the story of switching kids. Ko Tsun takes Inspector Lau to save Chi-tung. Ho-yee persuades Ko Tsun to draw the line between himself and Chi-lam. Chi-bun and Ka-pik recognize each other. Lai-kei becomes Y&N Business Director. Lai-kei runs into Apple, who invites Lai-kei to manage her artistes. And one of them is Lai-kei’s younger cousin sister.

programme.title: Sinister Beings 2 - EP 8

He was in a political marriage, and his nasty wife mistreated him. Kai-keung then encountered investment fund manager Shan-shan.

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 1
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Before the Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial, Kin Fung International Group Chairman Tai Cho-fuk wants to get off the hook, so he covertly plots to silence three key witnesses. RCU SIP Chow Chun-kit oversees a police operation code-named Eagle Nest with the aim the ensuring witness safety.

programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 8
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2074
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind six months, and Hon-yeung agonizes over the issue of the selection of a trustee. Meanwhile, Sau-yi manages to acquire a site in Singapore by submitting a tender that is way over the market price while keeping Hon-yeung in the dark. Ho-yee wants to renovate Diamond Plaza. But Sau-yi gets in her way.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne (with Eng Subs) - EP 7
programme.desc: Apple wants to borrow money. Although Lai-kei is reluctant, but she has second thoughts as Apple mentions some old story. The bank is not making any concessions regarding the interest repayment period. Ho-yee resorts to agreeing to Sau-yi starting the casino project in exchange for Diamond Plaza development rights.

programme.title: Class of Distinction - EP 4
programme.desc: Po (Leon Lai) worked in an advertising company, but his work was not appreciated. He was upset and quitted his job. He took Yi’s (Jessica Hester Hsuan) suggestion and become a teacher. There he met Sam (Theresa Lee), the school’s social worker. She inspired Po and he decided to become a good teacher. His effort and dedication gradually earned him support and respect from the students and his fellow colleagues.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower - EP 16
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 1
programme.desc: Because of some transfer arrangement and several complicated cases, AICIP Au Yeung Chung (Bobby Au Yeung) and CUSP Tsui Hay-yi (Joey Meng) become collaborating partners. The duo have mutual understanding. Sheung Siu (Jeannie Chan), daughter of a logistics company boss, hates Au Yeung Chung as she is certain that he has caused her family to break up. Au Yeung Chung had promised the late Mrs. Sheung he would be tolerant of Sheung Siu.

programme.title: Shadow Of Justice - EP 2

programme.title: Learning Curve Of A Warlord, The - EP 21
programme.desc: In the Warlord Era, DIK KEI (Dicky Cheung) is a lowly captain without any ambition. He has been using his crafty ideas and fast-talking to survive the past twenty years. Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

Due to successfully saving Marshal MUNG TAI-TUNG (Tsoi Kwok Hing), he is successively promoted seven grades and becomes a bully calling the shots in Sing Wai Town.

programme.title: Birth of A Hero - EP 11
programme.desc: To avoid all the strife caused by the gangland power struggles, YUK WAN-LUNG (Edwin Siu) and his elder sister YUK KIU-FUNG (Rachel Kan) lead a quiet life, running an inn. Unexpectedly, WAN-LUNG is determined to take part in the New Hero Contest, seeking to win his ex, NGAI BING-BING (Roxanne Tong), back. After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: The Stamp of Love - EP 20
programme.desc: KIM (HEUNG HOI LAN, ANNE) is a Malaysian. She marries a Hong Kong man, WAN (LAU DAN), in order to improve her family’s living standard. When she arrives in Hong Kong, she is very confused. She accidentally knocks out a stranger, MAN (KWONG WA), in the street. On the wedding day, WAN suddenly dies from a heart attack, so Kim’s dream of staying in Hong Kong is destroyed. _x000D__x000D_ With the help of WAN’s tenant, she finds a job.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 16
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.

programme.title: Fist Within Four Walls, A - EP 5
programme.desc: CHOR AU-KUEN (Ruco Chan) bears the grief of the loss of his family and returns to the walled city in hopes of finding his long lost sister, only to find out that the place he grew up in has become a lawless no man's land. Concealing his real identity as a Bajiquan master, he creates a new identity and gets acquainted with a feisty hair salon lady boss, TIU LAN (Nancy Wu), a dentist, DUEN YING-FUNG (Benjamin Yuen), and a worker, BUT TAK-LIU (Lam Tsz Sin).

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart - EP 65
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.title: Silver Spoon, Sterling Shackles - EP 1
programme.desc: During the 1930s in Hong Kong, where east meets west, feminist activists started campaigning for women's rights, seeking to uproot the phenomenon of men's superiority over women. Though having studied abroad in England and leading a western lifestyle, CHUNG CHEUK-MAN (Damian Lau) , a well-known Chinese barrister, is very traditional indeed.

After WAN-LUNG exposes a scandal involving the East Wing imperial guards, he is incarcerated by SAU PAK-KWAN (Ben Wong), a commander of the East Wing.

programme.title: Just Love - EP 1
programme.desc: Judge KO HEI MAN (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) and KOT KWOK KWONG (CHAN KAM HUNG, SUNNY) have agreed that MAN will concentrate on her career while KWONG will be taking care of the housework after they get married. Everything is in harmony until KWONG’s father discovers MAN and KWONG’s pre-marriage written agreement. Their relationship complicates ever since._x000D__x000D_ To make things worse, KWONG breaks the agreement and demands to have his own career.

programme.title: The Beauty Of War - EP 17
programme.desc: Chung Ka-po (Jeannie Chan), Lam Siu-mei (Hera Chan) and Lee Ching-yee (Moon Lau) are sisterly buddies. Due to different reasons after graduation, the trio gradually go their separate ways. Ka-po is arbitrarily nominated by Siu-mei to participate in a school beauty contest organized by some magazine. Ka-po is eventually the unchallenged winner, and the Golden Agent Wing Yat-yin (Joel Chan) then convinces her to join his agency. Yat-yin encourages Ka-po to sign up for the Miss Hong Kong Pageant.
